name: Tacoma ASP.NET CMS
short_description: web-based group/community-ware to provide features common to group sites like MSN & Yahoo Groups (contacts, calendar, photo sharing, databases, announcements, mailing list mangement) etc. Using ASP.NET to be deployed on MS and/or Linux platforms, database
